# location

**Instance Property**

The location of the restaurant.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var location: CLLocation { get set }
```

## Discussion

This value represents the location on the map where the restaurant’s marker appears.

## Accessing the Restaurant Information

- **name**: The name of the restaurant.
- **restaurantIdentifier**: A unique identifier for the restaurant.
- **vendorIdentifier**: The provider of the restaurant data.
